mStorySubsystemClass.description: The collection containing the world bounds

mTimeSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem to handle time of day.

mRailroadSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem that handles the rail network, signals and all the trains in the game.

mCircuitSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem that handles all the circuit simulations in the game, e.g. power grid.

mSchematicManagerClass.description: Subsystem to handle all schematics and recipes in the game.

mGamePhaseManagerClass.description: Subsystem to handle the game phase.

mResearchManagerClass.description: Subsystem to handle all research (M.A.M.) done in the game

mRadioactivitySubsystemClass.description: Subsystem that handles radioactivity in the world.

mChatManagerClass.description: Subsystem that handles the chat messages.

mCentralStorageSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem that handles the central storage.

mBuildableSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem to manage all the buildables in the game.

mFoliageRemovalSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem used to remove foliage on the map.

mProximitySubsystemClass.description: Subsystem used to show effects near the player.

mResourceSinkSubsystemClass.description: Subsystem that handles the resource sink system
